etomica.normalmode

Class WaveVectorFactoryFromFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.normalmode.WaveVectorFactoryFromFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WaveVectorFactory

    public class WaveVectorFactoryFromFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements WaveVectorFactory
    Obtains wave vectors and coefficients from a file.

    • Method Detail

      • getCoefficients

        public double[] getCoefficients()
        Description copied from interface: WaveVectorFactory
        Returns the coefficients for the wave vectors returned by getWaveVectors. If two of the wave vectors are redundant, their coefficient will be 0.5. Others will have a coefficient of 1.0.
        Specified by:
        getCoefficients in interface WaveVectorFactory

      • getWaveVectors

        public IVectorMutable[] getWaveVectors()
        Description copied from interface: WaveVectorFactory
        Returns the wave vectors generated by makeWaveVectors
        Specified by:
        getWaveVectors in interface WaveVectorFactory

      • makeWaveVectors

        public void makeWaveVectors(IBox box)
        Description copied from interface: WaveVectorFactory
        Tells the instance to make wave vectors appropriate for the given box. The wave vectors will not include the 0 vector, any two vectors which are opposites or any wave vector that is redundant with another.
        Specified by:
        makeWaveVectors in interface WaveVectorFactory
